data.text: @HouseDemocrats Sure it probably saves jobs but also drove up inflation.

@HouseDemocrats They saved jobs in all sectors but restaurants there you are seeing massive closures& bankruptcy. The reality is most of us are not rich enough to see this go anywhere but there without #ReplenishRRF
@HouseDemocrats The nations 2nd largest private employer is still waiting on @SenatorCardin @SenSchumer to keep their word.  Stop celebrating and finish the damn job.  #ReplenishRRF

@HouseDemocrats LIES, USING OVER INFLATED NUMBERS, AND PARTIAL DATA. THE MIDTERMS ARE COMING, AND THE DEMOCRATS IN WASHINGTON HAVE NOTHING POSITIVE TO REPORT, SO THEY NEED TO EXAGGERATE, AND LIE, TO GET VOTES. THE STATE OF THE UNION ADDRESS DIDNT ADDRESS THE STATE OF OUR UNION. IT'S HORRIBLE.

@HouseDemocrats SSI hasn’t been updated in 50 YEARS. Raise SSI to The National Poverty Line  $1,132.50. The Disabled shouldn’t be living BELOW Poverty. Also send $2,000 with recurring payments to the low/fixed income during  ongoing 7.5% inflation! #DemolishDisabledPoverty

@HouseDemocrats Is it comedy night? Because it’s not @IndpRestaurants throughout the U.S. that are struggling and closing. Congress and @POTUS failed us. Your sending millions to Venezuela as aid but not #ReplenishRRF. Sad…

@HouseDemocrats 2/3s of restaurants didn't receive this lifeline disbursed in a discriminatory manner. We shut our doors and complied and have not been compensated for the billions in losses. Please help us now before it's too late!!
@HouseDemocrats Left 177K restaurants completely behind, multiple times now. #replenishRRF https://t.co/irpxhjhRbs
